1273550.name: Fred The Rubber Ducky
1273550.description: Fred The Rubber Ducky is a cute pixel art 2d platformer where you play as a rubber ducky that’s tired of sitting in a bathtub. So he flushed himself down the toilet and goes out into the world looking for his purpose in life. Help Fred navigate through the world in his search for destiny, where danger lies around the corner in each of the 8 unique handcrafted and challenging levels.
1273550.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语, 日语, 俄语, 简体中文
